common.name: name
common.label: Name
common.default:
lowercase label and replace spaces with '_'

no label -> name is generated i.e. 'f1'
common.description: This value is is the variable name used

common.name: label
common.label: Label
common.description:
This is the label displayed for the field, if you want to hide the label then set this to false

The string can also contain mustache i.e.
'My choice {{value}}'

common.name: value
common.label: Value
common.description: Function will run once at instantiation

common.name: help
common.label: Help
common.description: This text is used to provide context or help in filling out the field

common.name: placeholder
common.label: Placeholder
common.description: This text will be visible in the text box until text is entered into the field

common.name: columns
common.label: Columns
common.description: The form is divided into a grid 12 columns wide, this is setting how many of those columns to display this element at, using this you can make split column forms

common.name: target
common.label: Target
common.description: If the target is not set then the field is appended to the parent element which is usually the main form but may be a fieldset

common.name: array
common.label: Array
common.description: if set to true or and object then this field will have buttons for adding and removing instances of the item. Additionally the value will become an array of all instances of this field. Further information on this can be found here.

common.name: display
common.label: Display
common.description: This option controls whether this field should be visible to the user, allowing for fields to only be used if certain conditions are met

common.name: enable
common.label: Enable
common.description: Similar to display but this option controls whether the field is enabled for interaction

common.name: parse
common.label: Parse
common.description: This option determins if the field will be in the data result from myform.get()

common.name: validate
common.label: Validate
common.description: This is a set of validations to perform on this field when validate() is called. Note: fields that are empty are not validated, if you require something to be filled in use the required attribute

common.name: required
common.label: Required
common.description: This is a special case for validation that is calculated live and updates the label to indicate the required status. Validation of this happens when validate() is called

limit.name: limit
limit.label: Limit
limit.description: This is used to set the maxLength property and limits the number of characters that can be entered.
